item.title: This Vs. Any Featured song in Auxy
item.dc:creator: NEWNAMES
item.description:
I used medly a while back. I (at the time) thought it had extremely high quality. I had bought the band pack, and had even copied over melodies from the Auxy iPad app. I thought my tracks were good (they weren’t) and then I started using auxy more. Then I had to delete the app because it wouldn’t update (Apple ID issues). In all, I’m not a fan of medly (only pentatonic and chromatic scales? Please.), but I would recommend it for people whose devices won’t support Auxy, because it’s a great place for ideas which you can eventually transfer over to auxy.

Read full topic
item.source: This Vs. Any Featured song in Auxy
